participant_1.background:
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
i hate winter.
I'm struggling with school but I'm happy with my family.
My collection of movie tickets reminds me of my favorite films.
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.

participant_2.background:
I hope my family would be accepting, but I don't know for sure.
My parents are both hard-working people who have always supported my dreams.
I'm glad my wife is feeling better and we can enjoy the outdoors together.
I enjoy sharing the recipes I've collected from my mother and daughters with others.
i listen to techno music , exclusively.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm just hanging out with my family and getting ready for the weekend.
Sounds fun! I'm just knitting a new scarf.  I love to knit to relieve stress.
That's great!  I used to knit a lot, but I haven't in a while.  I'm glad your family is supportive.
Thanks!  I'm really fortunate to have them.  What are your interests?
I love music, cooking, and the outdoors.  How about you?
Those are great interests!  I love music too, especially techno.  I also enjoy hiking and camping.  I'm not very good at cooking, but I like to try new recipes.
I love techno music too!  I'm not much of a hiker or camper, but I love to cook.  I have a lot of great recipes that I've collected from my mother and daughters.
That's awesome!  I wish I could cook like that.  I'm always looking for new recipes to try.
You should try some of my recipes!  I'm sure you'd like them.
I will!  Thanks for the offer!  What are some of your favorite recipes?
I have a lot of favorites, but I'd have to say my lasagna is my best dish.
Lasagna sounds delicious!  I love lasagna.
I'm glad you like it!  I'll have to make some for you sometime.
